import React from 'react'; import './mailtemplate.css'; import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {useSpring, animated, config } from 'react-spring' function MailTemplate({name,data,loadTheTemplate}) { const [loadStyle, setloadStyle]=useSpring(() => ({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1)"})) const [sendStyle, setsendStyle]=useSpring(() => ({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1)"})) const {push} = useHistory() console.log(data) return (
{ setloadStyle({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1.1)"}) }} onMouseLeave={() => { setloadStyle({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1)"}) }} onClick={() => { push("/mailEditor") setActiveDic({activeSend:false, activeMail:true}) setTimeout(() => { loadTheTemplate(data) },500) }} > { setsendStyle({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1.1)"}) }} onMouseLeave={() => { setsendStyle({transform:" translate(0%,0%) scale(1)"}) }} onClick={() => { alert("Mails has been sent to contacts") }} style ={sendStyle}>
); } export default MailTemplate ;
